system_info.query: SELECT hostname, computer_name, hardware_serial, cpu_brand, cpu_physical_cores, cpu_logical_cores, physical_memory, cpu_subtype FROM system_info;
system_info.description: Basic system information including CPU and memory

processor_registry.query: SELECT name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path = 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\HARDWARE\DESCRIPTION\System\CentralProcessor\0\ProcessorNameString';

cpu_name_registry.query: SELECT name, type, data FROM registry WHERE key = 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\HARDWARE\DESCRIPTION\System\CentralProcessor\0' AND name = 'ProcessorNameString';
cpu_name_registry.description: CPU name from registry alternative path

processor_all_registry.query: SELECT name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\HARDWARE\DESCRIPTION\System\CentralProcessor\%\ProcessorNameString';

graphics_registry.query: SELECT name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\Class\{4d36e968-e325-11ce-bfc1-08002be10318}\%\DriverDesc';

graphics_detailed.query: SELECT name, type, data FROM registry WHERE key LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\Class\{4d36e968-e325-11ce-bfc1-08002be10318}\%' AND name IN ('DriverDesc', 'HardwareInformation.AdapterString', 'Device Description');
graphics_detailed.description: Detailed graphics information from multiple registry sources

wmi_computersystem.query: SELECT hostname as Name, hardware_vendor as Manufacturer, hardware_model as Model, physical_memory as TotalPhysicalMemory, cpu_physical_cores as NumberOfProcessors, cpu_logical_cores as NumberOfLogicalProcessors FROM system_info;
wmi_computersystem.description: Computer system information via system_info table

wmi_bios.query: SELECT MAX(CASE WHEN name = 'SerialNumber' THEN value END) as SerialNumber, MAX(CASE WHEN name = 'Manufacturer' THEN value END) as Manufacturer, MAX(CASE WHEN name = 'SMBIOSBIOSVersion' THEN value END) as SMBIOSBIOSVersion, MAX(CASE WHEN name = 'ReleaseDate' THEN value END) as ReleaseDate FROM wmi_bios_info WHERE name IN ('SerialNumber', 'Manufacturer', 'SMBIOSBIOSVersion', 'ReleaseDate');

wmi_processor.query: SELECT cpu_brand as Name, cpu_brand as Description, '' as MaxClockSpeed, cpu_physical_cores as NumberOfCores, cpu_logical_cores as NumberOfLogicalProcessors, cpu_subtype as Architecture FROM system_info;
